snippet: When Ed Perzel spotted the Citroën 2CV, a charismatic  car first manufactured in 1948, during a trip to France, he knew he had to buy one. So he turned to a company in New Jersey.
abstract: Ed Perzel of West Jefferson, NC, owns Deux Chevaux Vapeur, charismatic French car produced by Citroen from 1948-90; Perzel fell in love with car during trip to Paris and bought one from Eurocar Imports in Toms River, NJ.
lead_paragraph: When Ed Perzel spotted the Citroën 2CV, a charismatic  car first manufactured in 1948, during a trip to France, he knew he had to buy one. So he turned to a company in New Jersey.

headline.seo: Devoted to Cars That Haul a Bit of French Charm
headline.main: Devoted to Cars That Haul a Full Load of French Charm
headline.print_headline: Devoted to Cars That Haul A Full Load of French Charm
